name: Torch Mimic
description: The Torch Mimic resembles an ordinary torch, with flames crowning its head. It remains motionless, perfectly imitating inanimate objects.
memorable: It regenerates health unless affected by cold damage and can mimic a torch flawlessly.
goals: Primarily serves as a deceptive creature to ambush unwary adventurers.
relations: Could be encountered alongside other mimics or creatures that utilize deception.
environment: Commonly found in dark or low-light environments, adapting to confuse passersby.
strengths: Regenerates health each turn and is resistant to fire damage.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to cold damage, which stops its regeneration.
attacks: Can bite for piercing damage and use a ranged Fire Blast attack that deals fire damage.
most_powerful_ability: Regeneration allows it to recover health each turn unless affected by cold.
skills: Has proficient Perception skills, allowing it to notice things in its vicinity.
additional_information: False Appearance allows it to blend in as an ordinary torch.
Fiery Soul lets it control the flames on its head.
Can go unconscious if extinguished by certain effects.
Dies only if it has 0 hit points at the start of its turn.
Can attack with both a bite and a fiery ranged attack.
test_queries: torch shaped creature that can fly
deceptive small monster resembling a torch
creature that regenerates health unless hit by cold
tiny monster with fire abilities and a bite attack
creature that uses tricky appearances in dark environments
